Html:
Hello, sorry for my bad english.  I need some help.

Example:

I have graph like that http://dl.dropbox.com/u/6171308/Example1.png

I need add edge from 12 to 10, without change positions of vertices.

To got this http://dl.dropbox.com/u/6171308/Example2.png

If you add a new edge each time you need to update the graphlayout, then the vertex positions are changed. How add edge on existing graphlayout without re-layout?

Another question: How i can change layout direction of Sugiyama from "TopToBottom" to "RightToLeft"?
Can some one help whith this problem?

Where you add the layout algorithm types add this line and then just choose it with the combo-box :

layoutAlgorithmTypes.Add("Simple");
